name: Level Up Boxing VR
description:
Eye of the tiger is on us! Fight your way to the top! Boxing the boxes has never been so much fun!

This is a too much fun of a Boxing VR game. Use your puching skills in the game with your real life physical punching skills. Get into some heavyweight fighting action against incoming boxes and bring down the big bad bosses. Are you tough enough to take ‘em all down? Step up your box game to bring down thugs with your soul and jaw crushing blows.

You can also shatter glass objects, punch the bad guys, break apart the red cubes and boxes which are totally two different things.

Remember the bully who used to beat you up? now with this game, you can be the guy who can stand up against bullies with your hurricane of iron fist!

Let the battle begin! Punch, counter-punch, jab, uppercut, body blow or hook and be the last man standing!
